text: Staldenried (Walliser German: Schtaaluried) is a municipality of the district of Visp in the canton of Valais in Switzerland. It has the largest hamlet of Gspon, the hamlets of Zur Kirche and Zur Tanne along with about twenty small villages. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Staldenried * Aerial cableway website * Category:Municipalities in Visp
title: Staldenried
